Sentencas: The present study highlights the effect of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doping on the crystal structure, surface morphology and ionic conductivity of ceria ceramics in the system Ce0.8Ga0.2-xCuxO2-delta for potential applications as the solid electrolyte material in the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Ultrafine Ce0.8Ga0.2-xCuxO2-delta (for x = 0, 0.05, 0.1, 0.15, and 0.2) nanopowders were prepared via glycine nitrate auto-combustion method.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Phase identification, microstructural, and ionic conductivity of all the ceria ceramics were observed by powder XRD, SEM, TEM, and impedance analyses, respectively.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Rietveld structural analysis using powder XRD pattern for all the co-doped systems confirms cubic fluorite type structure having Fm-3m space group, similar to cerium oxide.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: All these samples were found to have density above 85% after sintering at 1300 degrees C for 4 h. Raman spectra revealed the oxygen vacancies in all the compositions.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Thermal analysis for change in weight and thermal expansion coefficient with temperature were performed by TGA and high temperature XRD measurements, respectively.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Thermal expansion coefficient of the developed electrolytes matches with the commonly used electrode materials.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The composition Ce0.8Ga0.05Cu0.15O1.825 was found to demonstrate the maximum ionic conductivity with the least activation energy among all the existing co-doped ceria ceramics.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: These features make it a promising candidate in the IT-SOFC as the electrolyte material.
Titulo: Studies on structural, morphological, and electrical properties of Ga3+ and Cu2+ co-doped ceria ceramics as solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs
